scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts three figures on horseback, arranged in a vertical procession. The foremost figure, a man with curly hair and armor, rides a horse. Behind him, another man with a beard and a crown rides a horse, holding a sword aloft. Above him, a third figure, also crowned and bearded, raises a bow and arrow, with a sword also visible. The figures are set against a background of stylized clouds and horizontal lines suggesting movement or a landscape.
